column6: Quiet, wooded, culdesak neighborhood with a circle driveway for lots of parking and a spacious shaded backyard. \nThe convenient central location makes getting to Downtown Bryan or Texas A&M University a breeze. Enjoy watching fireflies and bunnies from the back patio and deck. There's a fenced section in the back for dogs and play fort area for kids.\nA great escape that gives you the nearby city perks with a relaxing out-of-town feel.
